pkgmetadata.longdescription:
SDF2 is a syntax definition formalism with the following features:
* Modular syntax definition (parametrized modules, symbol renaming) * Integrated lexical and context-free syntax * Declarative disambiguation constructs (priorities, associativity, and more) * Regular expression shorthands * All non-circular context-free grammars allowed!
SDF2 is implemented in two parts:
* The ParsetableGenerator * SGLR: a scannerless generalized LR parser
The above implementation accepts arbitrary context-free grammars as input.
